subject: Gas Pedal Spring
description_text:
Hello guys,

I have a Little question. I love you Simsonn Pro Pedal but can I buy a
stiffer Gas Pedal spring without pay 60€? I have already buy an Upgrade but
without a gas spring. can you help me please?

dear Eric Nötzold

conversations.body_text: Hi Eric Nötzold,  Our PlusX pedals come with two different spring options. Please take a photo of the spring you are currently using so we can check it for you.

Its a black light spring

service@simsonn.com
Hi Eric Nötzold,  Do you need a stiffer spring or a softer spring?

Hello,

I neee a stiffer spring if its available.


service@simsonn.com
Hi Eric Nötzold,    Sorry, we don't carry stiffer throttle springs—only stiffer clutch pedal springs.  Merry Christmas!
